Problem Solving을 효율적으로 만들기 위한 Framework 정리.

  • lessons in problem solving

My Problem-solving Framework

  1. Understand: be able to explain it in simple english/korean
  2. Plan: write the plan of steps in comments

  3. Divide:

    • break the problem into sub-problems
    • solve each problem one-by-one
    • connect the problems
    • if the problem seems to difficult, reduce it

  4. Debug or Reassess:

    • Debug: go step by step through your solution trying to find where you went wrong
    • Reassess: take a step back and look at the problem from another perspective. Is there anything that can be abstracted to a more general approach?
